snippet: The judge had said that Koss, a headphone maker, was benefitting from a vague and inadequate deal with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
abstract: Federal Judge Rudolph T Randa, who challenged the Securities and Exchange Commission in 2011 over the adequacy of a proposed fraud settlement with Koss Corp, approves the deal; Randa had said that Koss, a headphone maker, was benefiting from a vague and inadequate deal with the SEC.
lead_paragraph: The judge had said that Koss, a headphone maker, was benefitting from a vague and inadequate deal with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.seo: An S.E.C. Settlement, Challenged, Is Approved
headline.main: An S.E.C. Fraud Settlement, Questioned, Gets Approval
headline.print_headline: An S.E.C. Fraud Settlement, Questioned, Gets Approval
